attributes.comment:
We are in the process of adopting after several years of failed attempts trying to
get pregnant. The only way we can have children is through adoption. When we
started researching adoption we were stunned at the cost. At times, we wonder
how we will come up with the remaining amount that we still owe. We would love
to have more than one child but this is probably not an option due to the cost.

It is a shame that everyone has their hand out for money throughout the adoption
process. If it was not so expensive we may be able to provide more, less
fortunate children with loving homes. The average family can not afford adopting
as it is and to increase the fees by up to 66% is dispicable.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kelly R. Buster
